mapper.insert: insert into app( name, url, icon_url, category_id, description, weight, click_count, status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values( #{name}, #{url}, #{iconUrl}, #{categoryId}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{clickCount}, #{status}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update app
name = #{name},
url = #{url},
icon_url = #{iconUrl},
category_id = #{categoryId},
description = #{description},
weight = #{weight},
click_count = #{clickCount},
status = #{status},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select app.id, app.name, app.url, app.icon_url, app.category_id, category.name as category_name, app.description, app.weight, app.click_count from app left join category on app.category_id = category.id where app.create_user = #{userId} and app.status <= #{status}
